sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: What is the probability of rolling a dice and getting a 6?
message_2:
A standard dice has 6 faces, each with an equal probability of landing face up. Since there is only one face with the number 6, the probability of rolling a 6 is 1 out of 6 possible outcomes. 

So, the probability of rolling a 6 is 1/6 or approximately 0.1667 (rounded to four decimal places).
